about_the_game:
Advent Gallery

This Advent-themed gallery unlocks 24 additional levels for WooLoop! Working as an advent calendar, open one image per day to count down the days until Christmas!

Celebrate the Chrismas Season in Style

Contents

The Advent gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Gift
  • Turkey
  • Snowflake
  • Christmas Crackers
  • Pudding
  • Gingerbread
  • Mistletoe
  • Yule Log
  • Nutcracker
  • Stocking
  • Snowglobe
  • Candles
  • Sleigh
  • Snowman
  • Rudolph
  • Sleigh Bells
  • Carol Singers
  • Santa
  • Polar Bear
  • Jingle Bells
  • Fireplace
  • Wreath
  • Christmas Tree
  • Gingerbread House

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Advent Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Advent-themed gallery unlocks 24 additional levels for WooLoop! Working as an advent calendar, open one image per day to count down the days until Christmas! Celebrate the Chrismas Season in Style
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
